description: Message displayed when list export fails.
defaultMessage: Export failed. Please try again later or contact our support if the error persists.

description: Message displayed when list is exported successfully.
defaultMessage: Export started. You'll receive an email when it's ready.

description: Tooltip for the export list button
Confirmation message displayed on the export list modal.
defaultMessage:
To generate a spreadsheet (.csv) export of the contents of this list, select Start Export below.

When your export is ready for download, you will receive an email confirmation at:
{email}

description: Label of the export list confirmation button.
Title of the export list confirmation dialog.
